action.action-desc: Mr. Chabot (for himself and Ms. Spanberger) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means

form.official-title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the direct payment requirement on the exclusion from gross income of distributions from governmental plans for health and long-term care insurance, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Wally Bunker Healthcare Enhancement for Local Public Safety Retirees Improvement Act of 2022 or the HELPS Retirees Improvement Act of 2022.

section.header: Increase in amount excluded from gross income by reason of distributions from governmental retirement plans for health and long-term care insurance for public safety officers

subsection.text: Paragraph (2) of section 402(l) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended by striking $3,000 and inserting $6,000.
The amendment made by paragraph (1) shall apply to distributions in taxable years beginning after December 31, 2021.

section.header: Repeal of direct payment requirement on exclusion from gross income of distributions from governmental plans for health and long-term care insurance

subsection.text: Section 402(l)(5) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended to read as follows:

paragraph.text: For purposes of this subsection, all eligible retirement plans of an employer shall be treated as a single plan.

subsection.text: The amendment made by this section shall apply to distributions made after the date of the enactment of this Act.
